resources.string: NeoSign only works properly if you turn on Display over other app for the app
Please turn on Display over other app in your phone settings for the NeoSign app.This will not affect your other apps.
NeoSign only works properly if you turn off battery optimization for the app
Please turn off Battery Optimization in your phone settings for the NeoSign app.This will not affect your other apps.
Enable this option to keep screen of TV ON during all time when NEOSign app is running.
Enable this option to start NeoSign app automatically when screen is powered ON.
Application will automatically re-launch again in case of any crash.
